content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: $RELMIDS_EXISTS
      operator: equal_to
      value: true
    - name: TM
      operator: not_exists
Operations:
  - id: $RELMIDS_EXISTS
    name: RELMIDS
    operator: variable_exists
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0502
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when variable RELMIDS is present in any of the dataset
  and TM dataset is missing in a study.
Outcome:
  Message: TM dataset is missing when RELMIDS variable is present in any of the dataset.
Rule Type: Domain Presence Check
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0502
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The temporal relationship of the observation to the
                  Disease Milestone Instance Name in MIDS.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: RELMIDS
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when variable RELMIDS is present in any of the dataset and TM dataset is missing in a study.

Outcome.Message: TM dataset is missing when RELMIDS variable is present in any of the dataset.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The temporal relationship of the observation to the Disease Milestone Instance Name in MIDS.
